articles.description: In a hearing aimed at putting a capstone on the public sessions thus far, two military veterans will make the case that Mr. Trump neglected his presidential duties when he refused to call off the mob.
articles.content:

articles.author: Brie Stimson
articles.title: House committee approves first assault weapons ban bill in decades
articles.description: For the first time in two decades, a congressional panel has moved to prohibit the sale, transfer and possession of assault weapons in the United States.
articles.content:
The House Judiciary Committee on Wednesday moved a bill banning assault weapons forward but its unclear if the legislation has enough support to pass a floor vote.

articles.title: Two Texas men indicted in deaths of 53 migrants found in sweltering hot truck
articles.description: The 53 deaths is the deadliest migrant smuggling operation crossing the US border from Mexico.

articles.author: WSBTV.com News Staff
articles.title: Federal appeals court says Heartbeat Law is legal, allows it to take effect immediately
articles.description: A federal appeals court ruled on Wednesday that Georgia’s heartbeat abortion law should be allowed to take effect. Georgia’s law would ban abortions at the first sign of a fetal heartbeat, around six weeks into a pregnancy.
